overview: Romance - Star-crossed lovers Raj (Attin Bhalla) and Sandhya (Preeti Mehra) must challenge disapproving families, corrupt police, ruthless gangsters and outdated traditions if their love is to have a chance. Sandhya's pimp father has always wanted her for his flesh trade and arranges to sell her to a Bombay kingpin. With an underworld army on their heels, the lovers become fugitives; running for their lives ... and for love. -  Attin Bhalla, Preeti, Kader Khan
title: Dhadkanein
